title: Projects

featured.title: UGRacing Team Platform
featured.description: Comprehensive web platform for the University of Glasgow's Formula Student team, featuring project management, cost tracking, and team collaboration tools.
featured.longDescription: Built a full-stack web application to streamline UGRacing's operations, including automated cost calculations for Formula Student regulations, project timeline management, and team member coordination. The platform reduced administrative overhead by 60% and improved project delivery times.

featured.title: Smart Campus IoT System
featured.description: IoT-based environmental monitoring system for university buildings, tracking air quality, temperature, and occupancy levels in real-time.
featured.longDescription: Developed an end-to-end IoT solution using ESP32 microcontrollers and various sensors to monitor environmental conditions across campus buildings. The system includes a React dashboard for real-time data visualization and historical analysis.
highlights: Custom PCB design for sensor nodes
MQTT protocol for efficient data transmission

featured.title: EcoTrack - Carbon Footprint Tracker
featured.description: Award-winning mobile application that helps users track and reduce their carbon footprint through gamification and social features.
featured.longDescription: Winner of the 'Best Sustainability App' at HackGlasgow 2023. EcoTrack uses machine learning to analyze user behavior and provide personalized recommendations for reducing carbon emissions. Features include social challenges, achievement systems, and integration with public transport APIs.
